metadata.Title: CVE-2012-2321 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The loopback plug-in in ConnMan before 0.85 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in the (1) host name or (2) domain name in a DHCP reply.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2321` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

connman - 1.15-0ubuntu3
connman-vpn - 1.15-0ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: connman package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.15-0ubuntu3').
